title: Gold Prediction - Submodel Outputs
description: Pre-computed submodel outputs for gold price prediction model. Includes regime probabilities, mean reversion indicators, and volatility features from 9 different submodels. Used as input features for meta-model training.

resources.description: Technical indicators submodel outputs (trend_regime_prob, mean_reversion_z, volatility_regime)
CNY demand proxy submodel outputs (momentum_z, divergence_z)
Real interest rate submodel outputs (placeholder, no_further_improvement status)
